name: Jump! Jump! 2
description:
Monsters of all kinds have arrived from other worlds, known as Retrity. Become an axolotl and discover the mysteries of this world to stop Retrity and save the inhabitants of Leaf Town.

- Explore story mode with a variety of worlds in each level, puzzles, big battles against Retrity monsters, and breaks in Leaf Town. The further you progress, the more skills your axolotl will unlock for combat.

- Play in the arcade mode, a section of mini games to practice and improve your high score in each of the 4 available titles: Run and jump, Fishing time, Escape from the fortress and Colosseum.
